channel.title: relationship on BeaconStreet USA
channel.description: Recent content in relationship on BeaconStreet USA

item.title: INFJ Men as Lovers
item.description: INFJ men are complex, warm, and perceptive. They’re drawn to women who are intelligent, creative, and compassionate. While few INFJ men ever achieve perfect relationships, they always wish for them.

item.title: Perceiving vs. Judging—The Dating Game
item.description: Perceiving (P) and Judging (J) are a set of opposite traits on the Myers-Briggs Personality Inventory. They are called the attitude traits.

item.title: Sensors vs. Intuitives—The Dating Game
item.description: In the dating game, the Sensing and Intuitive Myers-Briggs preferences can be a source of excitement and, at the same time, confusion.
